title: Career Guidance
tagline: Your Future, Your Way, Let’s Find It Together.
description: Career clarity isn’t found in a test result, it’s built through guidance, reflection, and action. I support students, professionals, and career changers in exploring options, identifying their strengths, interests, and values, and understanding their unique personality and work style. From interpreting career assessments to choosing the right course, stream, or program, I help you confidently align your choices with real-world opportunities.
workWithMe: I offer personalized services including 1:1 career guidance sessions, detailed assessments with debriefs, career pathway planning, and subject or stream selection support. I also help with resume building, LinkedIn profiles, interview preparation, and career clarity workshops for schools and colleges.

faqs.title: What happens in a career guidance session?
faqs.content: Each session is tailored to your unique needs. We explore your personality, interests, and strengths and create a clear action plan.

faqs.title: Can you help me choose the right course or stream after 10th or 12th?
faqs.content: Yes. I specialize in stream selection and course planning based on strengths, interests, and future goals.

faqs.title: Will I get a ready-made answer or job suggestion?
faqs.content: No. You’ll gain clarity, options, and confidence to make your own informed decisions.

faqs.title: How can I book a session and what’s the cost?
faqs.content: You can book through the quote provided or message directly. Pricing is shared transparently before booking.

faqs.title: Will I be charged for it?
faqs.content: The Discovery Call is completely free and lasts 15 minutes.
